verses.name: Numbers 21:29
verses.text: Woe to thee, Moab! thou art undone, O people of Chemosh: he hath given his sons that escaped, and his daughters, into captivity unto Sihon king of the Amorites.

verses.name: Numbers 21:30
verses.text: We have shot at them; Heshbon is perished even unto Dibon, and we have laid them waste even unto Nophah, which reacheth unto Medeba.

verses.name: Numbers 21:31
verses.text: Thus Israel dwelt in the land of the Amorites.

verses.name: Numbers 21:32
verses.text: And Moses sent to spy out Jaazer, and they took the villages thereof, and drove out the Amorites that were there.
